subsection.name: Check out demo application
subsection.p: You can check out, build and run the demo application like the following:
subsection.source: $ svn co https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/hst-springsec/hst-springsec-demo/trunk hst-springsec-demo $ cd hst-springsec-demo $ mvn install $ mvn -P cargo.run

ul.li: You may navigate to 'home', 'about' and 'news' pages without authentication. Please refer to the configuration in /WEB-INF/applicationContext-security.xml for the access configuration.

You will be redirected to the 'Log In' page if you visit 'Secured Resource' page without logging in.
For your information, if you set different roles for the sitemap item, then you may meet 'HTTP 403 Forbidden' error for the restriced sitemap item even though you're authenticated.
When you click 'Log In' link and submit the login form with a valid credentials, you will get to the login page which is configured in /WEB-INF/applicationContext-security.xml.
